item.text: The revelation of Jesus Christ, which God gave him to show his servants what must happen very soon. He made it clear by sending his angel to his servant John,

<st data-num="3739" class="">who</st> then<n id="1" /> <st data-num="3140" class="">testified</st> to <st data-num="3745" class="">everything</st> that he <st data-num="1492" class="">saw</st> concerning the <st data-num="3056" class="">word</st> of <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="3141" class="">testimony</st> about<n id="2" /> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st>.
Blessed is the one who reads the words of this prophecy aloud, and blessed are those who hear and obey the things written in it, because the time is near!

From John, to the seven churches that are in the province of Asia: Grace and peace to you from “he who is,” and who was, and who is still to come, and from the seven spirits who are before his throne,

<st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="575" class="">from</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st>—the <st data-num="4103" class="">faithful</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="3144" class="">witness</st>,<n id="2" /> the <st data-num="4416" class="">firstborn</st> from among the <st data-num="3498" class="">dead</st>, the <st data-num="758" class="">ruler</st> over the <st data-num="935" class="">kings</st> of the <st data-num="1093" class="">earth</st>. To the one who <st data-num="25" class="">loves</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> has <st data-num="3089" class="">set</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st> <st data-num="3089" class="">free</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="1537" class="">from</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">our</st> <st data-num="266" class="">sins</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">at</st> the cost of<n id="4" /> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> own <st data-num="129" class="">blood</st>
and has appointed us as a kingdom, as priests serving his God and Father—to him be the glory and the power for ever and ever! Amen.

(Look! He is returning with the clouds,

and every eye will see him,

even those who pierced him,

and all the tribes on the earth will mourn because of him.

This will certainly come to pass! Amen.)
“I am the Alpha and the Omega,” says the Lord God—the one who is, and who was, and who is still to come—the All-Powerful!

I, John, your brother and the one who shares with you in the persecution, kingdom, and endurance that are in Jesus, was on the island called Patmos because of the word of God and the testimony about Jesus.

I <st data-num="1096" class="">was</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="4151" class="">Spirit</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="2960">Lord’s</st> <st data-num="2250" class="">Day</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">when</st><n id="3" /> I <st data-num="191" class="">heard</st> <st data-num="3694" class="">behind</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st> a <st data-num="3173" class="">loud</st> <st data-num="5456" class="">voice</st> <st data-num="5613" class="">like</st> a <st data-num="4536" class="">trumpet</st>,
saying: “Write in a book what you see and send it to the seven churches—to Ephesus, Smyrna, Pergamum, Thyatira, Sardis, Philadelphia, and Laodicea.”
I turned to see whose voice was speaking to me, and when I did so, I saw seven golden lampstands,
and in the midst of the lampstands was one like a son of man. He was dressed in a robe extending down to his feet, and he wore a wide golden belt around his chest.

<st data-num="846" class="">His</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2776" class="">head</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2359" class="">hair</st> were as <st data-num="3022" class="">white</st> <st data-num="5613" class="">as</st> <st data-num="2053" class="">wool</st>, <st data-num="5613" class="">even as</st> <st data-num="3022" class="">white</st> <st data-num="5613" class="">as</st> <st data-num="5510" class="">snow</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="3788" class="">eyes</st> were <st data-num="5613" class="">like</st> a <st data-num="4442" class="">fiery</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="5395" class="">flame</st>.

<st data-num="846" class="">His</st> <st data-num="4228" class="">feet</st> were <st data-num="5613" class="">like</st> <st data-num="5474">polished bronze</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="4448" class="">refined</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> a <st data-num="2575" class="">furnace</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="5456" class="">voice</st> was <st data-num="5613" class="">like</st> the <st data-num="5456" class="">roar</st><n id="3" /> of <st data-num="4183" class="">many</st> <st data-num="5204" class="">waters</st>.

He <st data-num="2192" class="">held</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2033" class="">seven</st> <st data-num="792" class="">stars</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="1188" class="">right</st> <st data-num="5495" class="">hand</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> a <st data-num="3691" class="">sharp</st> <st data-num="1366" class="">double-edged</st> <st data-num="4501" class="">sword</st> <st data-num="1607">extended out</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">of</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="4750" class="">mouth</st>. <st data-num="846" class="">His</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="3799">face</st> shone <st data-num="5613" class="">like</st> the <st data-num="2246" class="">sun</st> <st data-num="5316" class="">shining</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">at</st> <st data-num="1411">full strength</st>.

<st data-num="3753" class="">When</st><n id="1" /> I <st data-num="1492" class="">saw</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> I <st data-num="4098">fell down</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">at</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="4228" class="">feet</st> <st data-num="5613">as though</st> I were <st data-num="3498" class="">dead</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">but</st><n id="2" /> he <st data-num="5087" class="">placed</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="1188" class="">right hand</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">on</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st> and <st data-num="3004" class="">said:</st> “Do <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> be <st data-num="5399" class="">afraid</st>! <st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">am</st> the <st data-num="4413" class="">first</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="2078" class="">last</st>,

<st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the one who <st data-num="2198" class="">lives</st>! I<n id="1" /> <st data-num="1096" class="">was</st> <st data-num="3498" class="">dead</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">but</st> <st data-num="2400" class="">look</st>, now I <st data-num="1510" class="">am</st> <st data-num="2198" class="">alive</st>—<st data-num="1519 165">forever</st> and <st data-num="165" class="">ever</st>—<st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> I <st data-num="2192" class="">hold</st> the <st data-num="2807" class="">keys</st> of <st data-num="2288" class="">death</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> of <st data-num="86" class="">Hades</st>!<n id="2" />

<st data-num="3767" class="">Therefore</st> <st data-num="1125" class="">write</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">what</st> you <st data-num="1492" class="">saw</st>, <st data-num="3739" class="">what</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">what</st> <st data-num="3195" class="">will</st> <st data-num="1096" class="">be</st> <st data-num="3326" class="">after</st> <st data-num="3778">these things</st>.<n id="1" />

The mystery of the seven stars that you saw in my right hand and the seven golden lampstands is this: The seven stars are the angels of the seven churches, and the seven lampstands are the seven churches.
